website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, safe tunnel that can provide fun for your dog or young children.
pros: The interior padding ensures no injuries while using
Long and sturdy enough for a lab-sized dog to enjoy
Durable enough to be used outdoors
Comes with a velcro strap that holds it together when collapsed for easy storage
cons: Monitor kids and dogs when they're playing in this tunnel
Check fabric regularly to ensure no tears

customer_reviews.title: This tunnel was absolutely perfect for our Springer Spaniel
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel was absolutely perfect for our Springer Spaniel! I love that this tunnel stays upright, no support needed; our dog & cat both love running, walk and laying in this tunnel. It's perfect for playtime! Right now, we have it in the house and the 9' length works great but it will be easy to take it outside as well. It's light weight plus it's easy to put away due to a small strip of velcro that holds it closed. We all love the tunnel, it's definitely our dog's favorite purchase of 2017! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. Tunnel is very good construction and held up fine despite the following story: I have three dogs, one dog is new to Play so I have to intervene while she's learning to play Nice. The other Two dogs know these tunnels and it was Game on. The problem was New dog got tangled with another dog going in opposite directions in Tunnel. I had to break up a scrap of 120lbs worth of dogs inside the tunnel. Note to self: Never allow children and dogs to play in Tunnel at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Carla R.

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Good for light to medium use. The material is light compared to a professional quality tunnel so I wouldn't leave it out in the weather for the long run. It's good for less aggressive training or play time.
customer_reviews.author: EdC

customer_reviews.title: kids and adults enjoy playing in the tube
customer_reviews.text: So far, the dog, kids and adults enjoy playing in the tube, which is why we purchased it. So far, only used it indoors several times. Out of doors, It will work well for agility training and just keeping our very active dog happy. Easy to put up and take down, I have to decide how to anchor it to stop it from rolling or moving around too much.
customer_reviews.author: C. M-R

customer_reviews.title: Great Agility Tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tunnel to practice agility for our dog. It is smaller and lighter than a standard agility tunnel, but it works fine for practice in our back yard. It appears to be plenty sturdy for our intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just started Agility with my Std Schnauzers (33# & 40# dogs) and needed some basic, but durable equipment for training at home. A friend recommended this tunnel (she has Rottweilers 80#-100# dogs) as more durable than some other products without purchasing a competition tunnel for $300. Although the 9' length is less than competition length 15'-20', it is a nice compact, portable tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Std Schnauzer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Agility Practice
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing daily agility with my two pugs. Perfect size, dogs loved it, however the wire is starting to come through.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: This item is great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for kids, many hours of entertainment. Easy to store away with velcro fasteners and light enough to hang on the wall when not in use. I also have a 9 ft x 24" tunnel which is perfect for the adults to crawl thru to play with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: B4Mueller

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I read that it was nice an it is! I had got one from someone else that did not last one week with my two 55 pound dogs. This one cost more but is going to last. When I need to buy again I will get this one it is a much tougher fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly in good condition. Seems much more durable that the tunnel we were replacing. Our dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and rugged quality
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the one to get if you want it to last. The material feels similar to durable canvas. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: LightGuru

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable Product - lasted less than 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tunnel less than two months ago. Within 5 weeks the metal supports had ripped through the fabric. I only used this tunnel on grass. My dog is a puppy and has run thru it less than 20 times over the 6 weeks. Her weight was 21 - 35 lbs during this use. Unfortunately this is NOT a durable product. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: They still love it at 18 months old
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my puppies got too big for the "baby" tunnel. They still love it at 18 months old!! I've told all my friends about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS

customer_reviews.title: Super tunnel
customer_reviews.text: We found the missing tunnel. Charge my account for the tunnel. We decided to keep it as the puppies love the replacement. We can always use two.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rubinstein

customer_reviews.title: Orion Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a grat chute! it is made well. It is easy to set up and use. Our Border collie runs through it with no problems. I have even seen him run through it with toys in his mouth! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for long term sun exposure.
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing, and it's not that bad, it's outdoor equipment and the directions say to not leave it out in the sun. The dog loves to run through it. Folds up to almost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: My doggies and I are having fun crawling in the tunnel together
customer_reviews.text: Keeping it inside. My doggies and I are having fun crawling in the tunnel together. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard on little knees
customer_reviews.text: Tunnel is durable, well built, sturdy. Steel coil can definitely hurt little knees. My son was bruised on both knees the first time he played. We ultimately put a long excercise mat through it for some protection.. kind of a pain
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Gayoso

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tunnel! My kids love it. It's durable and there is plenty of fabric over the metal to protect the kids knees as they crawl through it. I love that this tunnel is larger (wider) and longer than most. This tunnel also folds up quickly and easily for storage. I highly recommend this tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: RR

product_meta.title: Pacific Play Tents Institutional 9 Foot X 22" Crawl Tunnel for Indoor/ Outdoor Fun, Blue
product_meta.description:
Color: Blue. At Pacific Play Tents, we are dedicated to creating the highest quality; most creative play environments Available. Each item is painstakingly tested to insure long lasting playtime fun and safe, creative structures designed to last. Our devotion to this is consistently validated through more awards as "best play value" And "toy of the year".

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Institutional 9'x22" Tunnel, These institutional strength tunnels are made to be durable and easy to use.
feature_bullets: Tunnel size: 9 ft. X 22 inch - tunnel collapses flat for easy storage and portability
Polyester Dacron 600x300 weave fabric with extra heavy duty construction for dog training, agility, and play
Interior padding around hardened heavy duty spring steel wire structure for safety and playtime comfort
Easily wipes clean with a damp cloth and mild soap - indoor or outdoor use
Crawling and tunnel play are excellent for muscle and motor skill development in toddlers and children

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
